DOC.detailed_description: Up 48 subject select enrol accord subject selection criterion : 8 subject mild renal impairment ( Group 1 ) , 8 subject moderate renal impairment ( Group 2 ) , 8 subject severe renal impairment ( Group 3 ) , 8 subject end stage renal disease yet dialysis ( Group 4 ) , 8 healthy subject normal renal function ( Group 5 ) , 8 subject end stage renal disease hemodialysis ( Group 6 ) .
DOC.criteria: All Subjects Females must negative result pregnancy test perform : At Screening urine specimen , On serum sample obtain Study Day 2 ( prior dosing ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 18 ≤ 38 kg/m2 , inclusive . Body Weight > 50 kg . Subjects Normal Renal Function In addition main inclusion criterion subject , follow criterion must meet subject normal renal function enrol Group 5 : Judged general good health base upon result medical history , physical examination , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . At screen , estimate GFR ( MDRD equation ) ≥ 90 mL/min/1.73 m2 . Subject Renal Impairment In addition main inclusion criterion subject , follow criterion must meet subject renal impairment enrol Groups 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 6 : Judged stable condition acceptable study participation base upon result medical history , physical examination , laboratory profile ECG . Presence chronic renal impairment indicate medical history screening estimate GFR ( MDRD equation ) < 90 mL/min/1.73 m2 . Subjects ESRD undergoing hemodialysis receive dialysis least 1 month . History significant sensitivity drug . Pregnant breastfeed female . Recent ( 6month ) history drug alcohol abuse . Positive test result hepatitis A virus immunoglobulin M ( HAVIgM ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) hepatitis C virus antibody ( HCV Ab ) HIV antibody ( HIV Ab ) . Negative HIV status confirm Screening result maintain confidentially study site . Subjects strict vegetarian diet .
